name: Reclining-Loveseat_Ivory_Bonded_Leather
reviews: Love it! Perfect for my space, compfortable & easy
description:
The left and right facing reclining seats join together instantly creates a love seat. Upholstered in ivory bonded leather with generously padded head and arm rests, lumbar support and reclining mechanism, this love seat will be the perfect addition to any entertainment area. The stitch detailing and pillow top arms give this set a comfortable yet modern look that is sure to enhance your living space. Ideal for movie night, reading a book or just to kick back and relax after a long day’s work, this modular motion series was designed for ultimate comfort. The left and right side is fitted together to form a love seat. Finish the look with the matching swivel glider recliner and sofa to complete the set!
